hero.text: Open a savings account with Argent Bank today!

priority.title: You are our #1 priority
priority.text: Need to talk to a representative? You can get in touch through our 24/7chat or through a phone call in less than 5 minutes.

savings.title: More savings means higher rates
savings.text: The more you save with us, the higher your interest rate will be!

security.title: Security you can trust
security.text: We use top of the line encryption to make sure your data and money is always safe.
